page.title: 04WEST COKER AREA FARMING
page.content: {BARTON FARM}WEST COKER THIS IS AMIXED BEEF AND ARABLE FARM OF ABOUT 200 ACRES. THEY HAVE 80 CATTLE INCLUDING CALVES WHICH ARE SOLD AT 2 YEARS. THEY GROW BARLEY,OATS, FIELD BEANS AND GRASS FOR SILAGE.THE CROPS ARE ALL USED FOR ANIMAL FEED,INCLUDING DOG FOOD. THEY HAVE 3 TRACTORS,A COMBINE, PLOUGHS,CORN DRILL AND HAY MAKING EQUIPMENT. THEY EMPLOY 2 PEOPLE WITH SOME PART TIME HELP. THIS FARM IS RENTED FROM SOMERSET C.C. IT IS THE LARGEST C.C.FARM. THE C.C. HAD INTENDED TO SELL OFF ALL THEIR FARMS BUT THIS DECISION WAS REVERSED AFTER THE RECENT C.C. ELECTIONS. THIS FARM WAS ONCE THE HOME OF WILLIAM PENN FOUNDER OF PENNSYLVANIA.
